languages.text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] When wielder {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy in the {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g} their nearest ally gets temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} in amount of wielders (Wil {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + Fel bonus)

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains <u>(wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g} bonus)</u> temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，离装备者最近的盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，离装备者最近的盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于<u>（装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。
当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战范围{/g}内的敌人时，离装备者最近的盟友获得临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，等同于{uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}。

languages.text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}内の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、着用者に最も近い味方は{uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接範囲{/g}内の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、着用者に最も近い味方は<u>（着用者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}＋{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}）の</u>一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}を得る。
着用者が{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接範囲{/g}内の敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、着用者に最も近い味方は{uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}の一時{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}EMP{/g} del portador)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales.

Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo en {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}alcance cuerpo a cuerpo{/g}, el aliado más cercano del portador gana {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, und zwar auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, erlangt der nächste Verbündete des Trägers {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}trifft{/g}, und zwar auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, erlangt der nächste Verbündete des Trägers <u>(Träger-{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WK{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}GEF{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

Wann immer der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, und zwar auf {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfreichweite{/g}, erlangt der nächste Verbündete des Trägers {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporäre {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, ближайший к персонажу союзник получает {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, ближайший к персонажу союзник получает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} персонажа + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g}.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}, ближайший к персонажу союзник получает <u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}ВОЛ{/g} персонажа + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}ОБЩ{/g})</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}временного здоровья{/g}.

Когда персонаж совершает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по противнику в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, ближайший к персонажу союзник получает {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} временного {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à portée de combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, l'allié le plus proche de l'utilisateur bénéficie de {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints} blessures{/g} temporaires.
languages.original_text: When the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy in {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee range{/g}, the wearer's nearest ally gains {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a} temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} un ennemi à {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}portée de combat de mêlée{/g}, l'allié le plus proche de l'utilisateur bénéficie de <u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} de l'utilisateur)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires.

Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi à portée de combat de {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}mêlée{/g}, l'allié le plus proche de l'utilisateur bénéficie de {uip|Wounds|8ca422bdbb9c493ba5ca32c6c657f34a}{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints} blessures{/g} temporaires.
